channel.title: CVE Feed for wpwax -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpwax -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-44048|2024-09-23T14:23:14.966Z -- wpwax -- product%20carousel%20slider%20%26%20grid%20ultimate%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in wpWax Product Carousel Slider & Grid Ultimate for WooCommerce allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Product Carousel Slider & Grid Ultimate for WooCommerce: from n/a through 1.9.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-8046|2024-08-27T07:34:33.457Z -- wpwax -- logo%20showcase%20ultimate%20%E2%80%93%20logo%20carousel%2C%20logo%20slider%20%26%20logo%20grid
item.description: The Logo Showcase Ultimate – Logo Carousel, Logo Slider & Logo Grid plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via SVG File uploads in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses the SVG file.

item.title: CVE-2024-32451|2024-08-08T16:12:04.296Z -- wpwax -- legal%20pages
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in wpWax Legal Pages.This issue affects Legal Pages: from n/a through 1.4.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-32451|2024-08-02T02:06:44.316Z -- wpwax -- legal%20pages
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in wpWax Legal Pages.This issue affects Legal Pages: from n/a through 1.4.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-32451|2024-04-15T07:51:31.898Z -- wpwax -- legal%20pages
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in wpWax Legal Pages.This issue affects Legal Pages: from n/a through 1.4.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-33929|2024-06-04T17:44:15.044Z -- wpwax -- directorist
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in wpWax Directorist.This issue affects Directorist: from n/a through 7.8.6.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in wpWax Directorist.This issue affects Directorist: from n/a through 7.8.6.

item.description: The Logo Showcase Ultimate – Logo Carousel, Logo Slider & Logo Grid plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via SVG File uploads in all versions up to, and including, 1.4.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses the SVG file.
